title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description: Description: When trying to select an item in the library outline view, it is not possible to do so on the first attempt. Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the library outline view. 2. Attempt to select any item in the view. 3. Observe that the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.
EB: Upon the second attempt to select the item, it can be successfully selected.
SR: The issue should be investigated and resolved to allow for the selection of items in the library outline view on the first attempt.
